title: email_threat
label: Email Threat
description: Monitors and alerts on email-based network attacks, including phishing, malware distribution, and other malicious email activities.

mailSubject.example: Urgent: Verify Your Account Immediately to Avoid Suspension

mailContent.example:
Dear User,

This is an urgent notification from your bank's security department. We have detected unusual login attempts on your account from an unrecognized device. To protect your account from unauthorized access and potential suspension, you must verify your identity immediately.

Please click on the following link to proceed with the verification process:
https://secure-login.bank-verify.example.com/confirm?session=abc123def456

This link will direct you to our secure verification portal. You will be asked to confirm your account number, online banking password, and the One-Time Password (OTP) sent to your registered mobile number.

Failure to complete this verification within the next 24 hours will result in the temporary suspension of your online banking access for security reasons.

If you did not attempt to log in recently, please contact our fraud prevention team immediately at 1-800-555-0199.

Thank you for your prompt attention to this critical security matter.

Sincerely,
Security Operations Center
Global Trust Bank

ruleName.example: Suspicious Phishing Email with Malicious Attachments Detected

suggestion.example: Block email and quarantine message for analysis. Notify recipients of potential phishing attempt and advise them to delete the email without clicking links or opening attachments. Update email filtering rules to block similar sender patterns and URLs. Conduct user awareness training on identifying phishing emails.
